issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

status.description: This issue has been validated/reproduced, but has not been prioritized yet.
status.name: Confirmed

fields.description:
This error is frequently logged (not always) and as a result workers seems to be not getting activity tasks.
The root cause is that querying Timer object throws NoSuchElementException. 

{code}
Fri Aug 12 12:49:52 2016 ERROR [TimeoutManager:Eucalyptus.bootstrap:ListenerRegistry:listenerTasks.class java.util.concurrent.ThreadPoolExecutor$Worker#4171] [com.eucalyptus.s

com.eucalyptus.simpleworkflow.SwfMetadataException: Error updating workflow-execution 'afaa3d3d-f2e8-473b-aa76-bce800a3ec36' for arn:aws:euare::000140065046:user/admin

fields.summary: SWF fails to update workflow execution

comments.body: Will keep an eye on it. Not clear how to reproduce yet.
